parts.part: <input type="text" id="data_PACKAGE_CODE" name="data_PACKAGE_CODE" value="" desc="package_code" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_RESOURCE_CODE" name="data_RESOURCE_CODE" value="3001" desc="resource_code" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_ZK_NAME" name="data_ZK_NAME" value="原价" desc="折扣率名称" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_RESOURCE_NAME" name="data_RESOURCE_NAME" value="全国流量包(100元/1G)" desc="流量包名称" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_LONG" name="data_LONG" value="6" desc="流量包时长" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_MONEY" name="data_MONEY" value="100" desc="金额" readonly="true"/> <!-- <input type="text" jwcid="@Insert"value="ognl:cond.MONEY" /> --> <input type="text" id="data_RES_MONEY" name="data_RES_MONEY" value="100" datatype="text" desc="应缴金额" style="display:none;"/> <input type="text" id="data_UNIT" name="data_UNIT" value="0" desc="单位" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_VALID_TIME_UNIT" name="data_VALID_TIME_UNIT" value="0" desc="有效时间单位" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_VALID_TIME" name="data_VALID_TIME" value="6" desc="有效时间" readonly="true"/> <input type="text" id="data_RESOURCE_COUNT" name="data_RESOURCE_COUNT" value="1024" desc="资源量" readonly="true"/>
